channel:
Gives you channel related commands.
> command: `/help channel`
story:
Gives you Story specific commands.
> command: `/help story`
addchannel:
Adds the current channel to your list of channels that receive new chapter notifications.
> command: `/addchannel`
Execute this command in a channel where you want to receive new chapter notifications.
(Restricted for Admins and Mods)
removechannel:
Removes the current channel from your list of channels that receive new chapter notifications.
> command: `/removechannel`
Execute this command in a channel where you don't want to get new chapter notifictaions.
(Restricted for Admins and Mods)
getchannels:
Gives you all the channels in your server that are receiving new chapter notifications.
> command: `/getchannels`
addstory:
Your story will be added to receive new chapter notificatins.
> command: `/addstory <url of the story>`
 Example: `/addstory https://www.wattpad.com/story/266544533-the-true-elites`
(Restricted for Admins and Mods)
removestory:
Your current story will no longer receive the new chapter notifications.
> command: `/removestory <url of the story>`
 Example: `/removestory https://www.wattpad.com/story/266544533-the-true-elites`
(Restricted for Admins and Mods)
fetch:
Gives all the stories in your sever that are receiving new chapter notifications
> command: `/getstories`
